Organized byÂ  CSeC IITB

We're a group of enthusiasts who actively participate in Capture The Flag (CTF) competitions. Our mission is simple: to make cyber security accessible and engaging for everyone in the institute.

From hands-on workshops to collaborative learning, we're here to equip you with the skills needed to navigate the ever-changing cyber security landscape. Join us in exploring the ins and outs of digital security and let's work together to ensure a safer digital future.

Ready to Test Your Skills?

Join us for an unforgettable hacking experience!
